newsitem.title: FRANCE: SCOR nine-month sales up 10.4 pct.
newsitem.headline: SCOR nine-month sales up 10.4 pct.

text.p: (All figures in millions of French francs)

NOTE - The company gave its results in the BALO official bulletin. The company said that due to its acquisition of the reinsurance activities of the Allstate company its 1996 turnover would would grow by more than the rate posted at September 30.
